non_disclosure: The Recipient agrees to maintain all proprietary and confidential information in strict confidence and shall not disclose it to third parties without prior written consent.
non_compete: The Employee shall not engage in competing business activities within a 100-mile radius for a period of 6 months following the termination of employment.
termination_clause: This Agreement may be terminated by either party upon 30 days' notice, or immediately in the event of material breach or fraud.
